description:
'''David Bustamante Hoyos''' (born 25 March 1982) is a Spanish [[pop music|pop]] singer and songwriter.

He gained his initial fame in 2001 as a third-place winner on ''[[Operación Triunfo (Spain)|Operación Triunfo]]'', the interactive musical reality television show that went on to achieve the highest audience ratings in the history of Spanish TV.

Bustamante has sold more than 2 million records—albums and singles combined—in Spain and [[Latin America]], getting 15 [[Platinum certification|Platinum]] in albums, digital downloads and mobile ringtones. By 2019, nine of his ten albums had reached number one in [[Spain]].

His latest hit is "Héroes" (2019).
